trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Columbia
There were no other sightings in Columbia on or around February 29th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWas watching the skies as usual while the family was driving us to go eat, focusing on a jet at the time. It was almost directly above me when I saw a white light suddenly appear in front of it. It accelerated with starting speed and missed the jet from above, slowing and halting in probably 1 second flat. It hovered as I sat bewildered. I wanted to get a size comparison of the light itself and the jet, but at the time the jet had moved on behind the roof of the car, so I had to crane my neck to see it. By the time I looked back to find the light, it had disappeared and I didn't see it again afterwards. From my memory, it was probably either the same size as the jet, or a little over half the size.
Summary: Was watching a jet fly when suddenly, a white light appeared and charged the jet extremely fast. Missing it from above, it halted almost immediately and hovered. It soon disappeared.
